scripts.install-wide:
echo "Installing server dependencies
" && cd server && npm install && echo "Installing client dependencies
" && cd ../client && npm install
scripts.build-client:
echo "Building Client
" && cd client && ng build --prod
scripts.start-prod-first-time: npm run install-wide && npm run build-client && npm run start-prod
scripts.start-dev-first-time: npm run install-wide && npm run build-client && npm run start-dev
